name: Doltramp 1.2 Demo
description:
Fun silly game Doltramp the clown a short Fun silly game Mario style platformer game for PC.Help Doltrump the Clown get to the Circus, defy gravity, defeat Trwolls and check out the Magnificent Wall along the way. The poor Trwolls just want peace and quiet but everyone knows clowns can't help but be noisy. Especially with squeaky clown shoes! Fun funny silly 3d game.

Requires Min Graphics card Geforce 650 or Radeon 7790

Fullscreen =F Access console via ~ Unzip files and play.
